title: Kind Belly
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves a variety of smoothies, wraps, sandwiches and salads. Also offers acai bowls. Has several vegan choices; try the good belly sandwich. Uses vegan ingredients such as tofu, chickpeas and agave. Seating for 6 inside and two tables on the patio. Mostly take out.
